org.jgentleframework.context.aop
Interface ParameterFilter<T>

All Superinterfaces:
Filter<ParameterMatching<T>>, Matcher<ParameterMatching<T>>, RuntimeSupportFilter<ParameterMatching<T>>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractDefinitionMatcherPointcut.DefinitionMatcherParameterFilter, AbstractDefinitionMatcherPointcut.DefinitionMatcherParameterFilterClass, TrueParameterFilter
public interface ParameterFilter<T>
extends RuntimeSupportFilter<ParameterMatching<T>>, Matcher<ParameterMatching<T>>

Filter that restricts matching of a pointcut or introduction to a given set of parameters corresponding to an given set of methods.

Author:
LE QUOC CHUNG - mailto: skydunkpro@yahoo.com
See Also:
RuntimeSupportFilter, Matcher, MethodFilter, ConstructorFilter

matches

boolean matches(ParameterMatching<T> matching)
Perform static or dynamic checking whether the given ParameterMatching matches. If the RuntimeSupportFilter.isRuntime() method returns true, a runtime check on this method call) will be made.
